content: looking for a fun and easy project that makes a great gift be sure to give our easy shell scarf pattern a try just a 2 row repeat feel free to use any yarn you like for this pattern the super saver ombre is a worsted weight yarn category #4 but you can use dk or chunky yarn if you like it will affect the final width but since you can crochet until it s as long as you like it will be fine use up that stash yarn this scarf can be made flat or as an infinity scarf as you see here just stitch the end closed to make a cowl or infinity scarf and leave open if you want a traditional scarf you can choose to add fringe pom poms or tassels as well
